section.title: Creating a Zone PIN Key (ZPK)
section.para: In this exercise, we create a Zone PIN Key (ZPK) using console commands.
When prompted for the ZMK, use the encrypted ZMK value from .
section.db:programlisting: KG Key length [1,2,3]: 2 Key Type: 001 Key Scheme (LMK): U Key Scheme (ZMK) [ENTER FOR NONE]: X Enter encrypted ZMK [ENTER FOR NONE]: U 104C 4216 A751 FEEE FF55 698B 26C5 7789 Enter ZMK check value [ENTER TO SKIP CV TEST]: Key under LMK: U 8586 51EC 83AF CA66 8175 804F 5B7D CD6B Key encrypted for transmission: X BAA5 18AA D10D 28A2 D32A 5688 317F 44EB Key check value: 6543 F4
